casebody.data:
Francis A. FAHEY and Josephine Fahey, as Administrators of the Estate of Eileen Fahey, Deceased, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Defendant-Appellee. No. 140, Docket 23247. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Submitted Feb. 9, 1955 Decided Feb. 11, 1955. Paul O’Dwyer (of O’Dwyer, Bem-stien & Preusse), New York City, for plaintiff s-appellants. Robert K. Ruskin, Asst. U. S. Atty., New York City (J. Edward Lumbard, U. S. Atty., New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, HINCKS, Circuit Judge, and SMITH, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Reversed. Panella v. United States, 2 Cir., 216 F.2d 622.
